description: The Bee’s Knees is a refreshing drink that can be made in minutes. It has a nice&nbsp;citrus flavor, and it's sweet without being too sugary. The recipe is ridiculously easy to make, but the ingredients are not always easy to find.
name: Bee’s Knees

recipeInstructions.name: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake vigorously.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake vigorously.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with oranges and a lemon twist if desired.
